Aspirin (Bottle).name: Aspiryna (butelka)
Aspirin (Bottle).description:
Zawiera 10 dawek. Każda z nich leczy 1 siniak po 10 minutach. Maksymalnie 2 siniaki na cztery godziny.

Zniszczenie 2

Automotive Kit.name: Zestaw Samochodowy
Automotive Kit.description:
Umożliwia użycie umiejętności Maszyn do naprawy i budowy pojazdów.

Zniszczenie 4

Backpack.name: Plecak
Backpack.description:
Pozwala na przenoszenie do 4 Mas przedmiotów . Nie wliczają się one do całkowitej Masy bagażu (chociaż sam plecak nadal się wlicza).

Zniszczenie 4

Bandages.name: Bandaże
Bandages.description:
Umożliwia użycie Wsparcia i @UUID[Compendium.hopefinder.actions.Item.jIN7minzIXOY3YJk]{Leczenie ran}. Zużywane przy użyciu.

Zniszczenie 1

Battery (Large).name: Bateria (Duża)
Battery (Large).description:
Zasilanie dostosowane do urządzenia. Duże i małe baterie nie są wymienne bez zastosowania bocznika mocy. Duża bateria ma 10 razy większą moc niż mała bateria.

Zniszczenie 2

Battery (Small).name: Bateria (Mała)
Battery (Small).description:
Zasilanie dostosowane do urządzenia. Duże i małe baterie nie są wymienne bez zastosowania bocznika mocy.

Zniszczenie 1

Beer.name: Piwo
Beer.description:
Liczy się jako -1 punkt Nawodnienia. Wypicie tego napoju usuwa 1 siniak. Można skorzystać z tej właściwości tylko raz na dzień.

Zniszczenie 1

Bike Helmet.name: Kask Rowerowy
Bike Helmet.description:
Dodaje hełm do twojej zbroi, zapewniając ochronę przed krytycznymi trafieniami.

Zniszczenie 4

Bullets (Pistol).name: Pociski (pistolet)
Bullets (Pistol).description:
Standardowa amunicja. Zadaje obrażenia określone w opisie broni.

Zniszczenie 1

Bullets (Rifle).name: Pociski (karabin)
Bullets (Rifle).description:
Standardowa amunicja. Zadaje obrażenia określone w opisie broni.

Zniszczenie 1

Bullets (Shotgun).name: Pociski (strzelba)
Bullets (Shotgun).description:
Standardowa amunicja. Zadaje obrażenia określone w opisie broni.

Zniszczenie 1

Canned Goods (Expired).name: Konserwy (przeterminowane)
Canned Goods (Expired).description:
Liczy się jako 1 posiłek. Jeśli zjesz przeterminowaną żywność, musisz wykonać test @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15] lub dostaniesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Mdłości} na 1 dzień.

Zniszczenie 1

Climbing Kit.name: Zestaw Wspinaczkowy
Climbing Kit.description:
Daje +2 do testów Atletyki wykonywanych w celu wspinaczki.

Zniszczenie 4

Cold Pack.name: Zimny Okład
Cold Pack.description:
Leczy [[/r 1d4 #Siniaki]]{1k4 siniaków} w ciągu 10 minut. Można użyć tylko jednego okładu na 6 godzin.

Zniszczenie 1

Duct Tape.name: Taśma Klejąca
Duct Tape.description:
Może tymczasowo naprawić do 4 wgnieceń na przedmiotach. Każda naprawa trwa 1 minutę. Naprawa trwa tylko do momentu, gdy przedmiot ponownie ulegnie wgnieceniu.

Zniszczenie 1

Flashlight.name: Latarka
Flashlight.description:
Działa przez 4 godziny na jednej małej baterii. Zapewnia światło o mocy @Template[type:cone|distance:30].

Zniszczenie 1

Generator.name: Generator
Generator.description:
Zapewnia dużą moc, ale do działania potrzebuje 1 galon benzyny na godzinę.

Zniszczenie 1

Hardhat.name: Kask Ochronny
Hardhat.description:
Dodaje hełm do twojej zbroi, zapewniając ochronę przed krytycznymi trafieniami.

Zniszczenie 4

Headlight.name: Latarka Czołowa
Headlight.description:
Działa przez 8 godzin na jednej małej baterii. Zapewnia stożek światła o zasięgu 15 stóp.

Zniszczenie 1

Hiking Boots.name: Buty Trekkingowe
Hiking Boots.description:
Zapewnia stabilność. Użytkownik nie musi wykonywać testów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balansowania} na nierównym terenie.

Zniszczenie 4

Laptop.name: Laptop
Laptop.description:
Runs for 4 hours on one large battery.

Break 4

Liquor.name: Liquor
Liquor.description:
Counts a -1 Hydration. Drinking it removes 2 bruises. Can only benefit from this once per day.

Break 1

Lockpicks.name: Lockpicks
Lockpicks.description:
Allows the use of Thievery to pick keyed locks.

Break 2

Machinery Kit.name: Machinery Kit
Machinery Kit.description:
Allows the use of Machinery to fix and build machines (not vehicles).

Break 4

Makeup Kit.name: Makeup Kit
Makeup Kit.description:
Allows the use of Deception to impersonate someone.

Break 1

Map (Local).name: Map (Local)
Map (Local).description:
Shows the main locations and important streets, as well as a few forgotten paths.

Break 1

Meat (Fresh).name: Meat (Fresh)
Meat (Fresh).description:
Counts as 2 food. Spoils if not eaten within [[/r 1d4 #Days]]{1d4 days} ([[/r 2d4 #Days]]{2d4} if cooked).

Break 1

Military Helmet.name: Military Helmet
Military Helmet.description:
This adds a helmet to your armor, offering you protection against critical hits.

Break 8

Multitool.name: Multitool
Multitool.description:
Has small versions of most tools. Allows for skill checks that require tools (such as @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Disable Device]{Disable Device}).

Break 2

Piercing Bullets (Pistol).name: Piercing Bullets (Pistol)
Piercing Bullets (Pistol).description:
Armor piercing round of ammunition. Halves the armor resistance of the target, if any (round down).

Break 2

Piercing Bullets (Rifle).name: Piercing Bullets (Rifle)
Piercing Bullets (Rifle).description:
Armor piercing round of ammunition. Halves the armor resistance of the target, if any (round down).

Break 2

Piercing Bullets (Shotgun).name: Piercing Bullets (Shotgun)
Piercing Bullets (Shotgun).description:
Armor piercing round of ammunition. Halves the armor resistance of the target, if any (round down).

Break 2

Power Shunt.name: Power Shunt
Power Shunt.description:
Transfers power from a battery to a device, giving it the power it needs to function. Takes 1 minute to use.

Break 1

Radio (Battery).name: Radio (Battery)
Radio (Battery).description:
Battery radio runs for 1 day on a small battery.

Break 1

Radio (Crank).name: Radio (Crank)
Radio (Crank).description:
Crank radio runs indefinitely as long as it is cranked every hour.

Break 2

Ration (Bar).name: Ration (Bar)
Ration (Bar).description:
Basic military ration bar. Counts as 1 food.

Break 1

Ration (Day).name: Ration (Day)
Ration (Day).description:
Basic military meal kit. Counts as 3 food.

Break 1

Sedative.name: Sedative
Sedative.description:
Injected or in pill form. 1 minute after taking, the target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save or fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} for 1 hour. Without it, surgery checks attempted on the target take a -4 penalty.

Break C

Siphon Kit.name: Siphon Kit
Siphon Kit.description:
Slowly drains fuel or liquid from one tank to another receptacle. Takes 1 minute per gallon transferred.

Break 2

Soft Drink.name: Soft Drink
Soft Drink.description:
Soda, juice, water, or tea. Counts as 1 hydration.

Break 1

Splint.name: Łubki
Splint.description:
Allows a broken bone to heal over [[/r 2d4 #weeks]]{2d4 weeks}. Removes penalty in 1 day.

Break 2

Tool Belt.name: Tool Belt
Tool Belt.description:
Lets you carry up to four tools as ready items (takes up only 1 spot on your ready list).

Break 2

Trap (Explosive).name: Trap (Explosive)
Trap (Explosive).description:
Simple wire traps that can be set up in 1 minute. Each trap creates a @Template[type:line|distance:10] and anyone walking through that line must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:15] save or set off the trap. The trap can be noticed with a @Check[type:perception|dc:20] check. Traps are destroyed when they are sprung.

This trap sets off a grenade. Damage is based on the grenade, which is not included.

Break 2

Trap (Noise).name: Trap (Noise)
Trap (Noise).description:
Simple wire traps that can be set up in 1 minute. Each trap creates a @Template[type:line|distance:10] and anyone walking through that line must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:15] save or set off the trap. The trap can be noticed with a @Check[type:perception|dc:20] check. Traps are destroyed when they are sprung.

If set off, this trap makes a lot of noise and is clearly audible in a @Template[type:burst|distance:50]{50-foot radius}.

Break 1

Trap (Trip Wire).name: Trap (Trip Wire)
Trap (Trip Wire).description:
Simple wire traps that can be set up in 1 minute. Each trap creates a @Template[type:line|distance:10] and anyone walking through that line must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:15] save or set off the trap. The trap can be noticed with a @Check[type:perception|dc:20] check. Traps are destroyed when they are sprung.

Creatures that fail against this trap are knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

Break 1

Urban Camouflage.name: Urban Camouflage
Urban Camouflage.description:
A collection of lightweight trash and debris attached to a mesh body suit that makes the wearer appear like a mound of garbage. Provides a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks in urban environments.

Break 2

Vegetables (Fresh).name: Vegetables (Fresh)
Vegetables (Fresh).description:
Counts as 1 food. Spoils if not eaten within [[/r 1d6 #Days]]{1d6 days} ([[/r 2d6 #Days]]{2d6} if cooked).

Break 1

Vitamins (Bottle).name: Vitamins (Bottle)
Vitamins (Bottle).description:
Has 10 doses. Each dose gives a +2 bonus on Fortitude saves for 1 day. Does not stack with itself.

@UUID[Compendium.hopefinder.effects.Item.nBTRC7tLNZt1oNlK]{Effect: Vitamins}

Break 1

Walkie Talkie.name: Walkie Talkie
Walkie Talkie.description:
Allows for communication out to a range of 5 miles. Runs for 4 hours on a small battery. Most settlements have a permanent walkie talkie wired to their power source.

Break 4

Water (1 Gallon).name: Water (1 Gallon)
Water (1 Gallon).description:
Jug that contains enough water for 4 hydration.

Break 1

Water Purification Tablets.name: Water Purification Tablets
Water Purification Tablets.description:
Package contains 4 tablets. Each tablet purifies 1 gallon of water from biological agents (include the Z Plague). It does not remove chemical or heavy metal contaminants.

Break 1

Z-Noc.name: Z-Noc
Z-Noc.description:
Gives your body the tools to fight the Z Plague. While in Stage 1 of the infection, whenever you roll a Fortitude save, you may roll twice and take the better result.

@UUID[Compendium.hopefinder.features.Item.PplJHSqlQOz25dpl]{Innoculated}

Break C

Z-Round Bullets (Pistol).name: Z-Round Bullets (Pistol)
Z-Round Bullets (Pistol).description:
Special round designed specifically to be lethal to zombies. Z Rounds deal double the weapons listed damage against zombies (roll twice as many dice). On a critical hit, they automatically kill a zombie.

Break 4

Z-Round Bullets (Rifle).name: Z-Round Bullets (Rifle)
Z-Round Bullets (Rifle).description:
Special round designed specifically to be lethal to zombies. Z Rounds deal double the weapons listed damage against zombies (roll twice as many dice). On a critical hit, they automatically kill a zombie.

Break 4
